original: prītiprakarṣāddhṛtisampadā ca vapurguṇādeva ca tasya rājñaḥ /

original: ratnaprabhodbhāsuraruciratsaruṃ niśitaṃ nistriṃśamādāya svamāṃsāni cchittvā tebhyaḥ prāyacchat /

vaidya

original: atha te yakṣāstaṃ rājānaṃ svamāṃsotkartanaparaṃ tathaivāskhalitavadanaprasādamavikampyamānaṃ māṃsacchedavedanābhirabhivīkṣya prasādaṃ vismayaṃ  #
analyzed: atha te yakṣāḥ tam rājānam sva māṃsa utkartana param tathā eva a skhalita vadana prasādam a vikampyamānam māṃsa cheda vedanābhiḥ abhivīkṣya prasādam vismayam

original: santarpitāḥ smastavānayādbhutayā yācanakajanamanoharayā pratipattyeti sasambhramāḥ sapraṇāmaṃ vinivārya rājānaṃ prasādāśrupariṣiktavadanāḥ  #

analyzed: kaḥ hi pratyupakāra arthī tasya bhūyaḥ kariṣyati
vaidya
upakartā tu dharmeṇa paratas tad phalena ca
yogam āyāti niyamāt iha api yaśasaḥ śiryā
kṛtaḥ ced dharmaḥ iti eva kaḥ tatra anuśayaḥ punar
atha pratyupakāra artham ṛṇa dānam na tat kṛtam

original: upakṛtaṃ kila vetti na me parastadapakāramiti prakaroti yaḥ /
analyzed: upakṛtam kila vetti na me paraḥ tad apakāram iti prakaroti yaḥ

original: nanu viśodhya guṇaiḥ sa yaśastanuṃ dviradavṛttimabhipratipadyate // Jm_34.20 //
analyzed: nanu viśodhya guṇaiḥ sa yaśaḥ tanum dvirada vṛttim abhipratipadyate

original: na vetti cedupakṛtamāturaḥ paro na yokṣyate 'pi sa guṇakāntayā śriyā /
analyzed: na vetti ced upakṛtam āturaḥ paras na yokṣyate sa guṇa kāntayā śriyā

original: sacetasaḥ punaratha ko bhavetkramaḥ samucchritaṃ pramathitumātmano yaśaḥ // Jm_34.21 //
analyzed: sacetasaḥ punar atha kaḥ bhavet kramaḥ samucchritam pramathitum ātmanaḥ yaśaḥ
idam tu atra me yukta rūpam pratibhāti
yasmin sādhu upacīrṇe mitra dharmaḥ na lakṣyate
aniṣṭhuram asaṃrabdham apayāyāt śanais tatas

original: atha sā devatā tatsubhāṣitaprasāditamanāḥ sādhu sādhviti punaruktamabhipraśasya tattatpriyamuvāca -
analyzed: atha sā devatā tad su bhāṣita prasādita manāḥ sādhu sādhu iti punaruktam abhipraśasya tat tat priyam uvāca
ṛte jaṭā valkala dhāraṇa śramāt bhavān ṛṣiḥ tvam vidita āyatiḥ yatiḥ

original: na veṣamātraṃ hi munitvasiddhaye guṇairupetastviha tattvato muniḥ // Jm_34.23 //
analyzed: na veṣa mātram hi muni tva siddhaye guṇaiḥ upetaḥ tu iha tattvataḥ muniḥ
iti abhilakṣya pratipūjya enam tatra eva antardadhe

original: tadevaṃ protsāhyamāno 'pi sādhurnālaṃ pāpe pravartitumanabhyāsāditi sajjanapraśaṃsāyāṃ vācyam /
analyzed: tat evam protsāhyamānaḥ pi sādhuḥ na alam pāpe pravartitum anabhyāsāt iti sat jana praśaṃsāyām vācyam

original: evaṃ kṣāntikathāyāmapyupaneyam - evaṃ kṣamāparicayānna vairabahulo bhavati,
analyzed: evam kṣānti kathāyām api upaneyam evam kṣamā paricayāt na vaira bahulaḥ bhavati
na avadya bahulaḥ bahu jana priyaḥ manoṅaḥ ca iti

original: evaṃ pratisaṃkhyānabahulāḥ svāṃ guṇaśobhāmanurakṣanti paṇḍitā iti pratisaṃkhyānavarṇe vācyam /
analyzed: evam pratisaṃkhyāna bahulāḥ svām guṇa śobhām anurakṣanti paṇḍitāḥ iti pratisaṃkhyāna varṇe vācyam

original: tathāgatamāhātmye ca bhadraprakṛtyabhyāsavarṇe ca - evaṃ bhadraprakṛtirabhyastā tiryaggatānāmapi na nivartata iti /
analyzed: tathāgata māhātmye ca bhadra prakṛti abhyāsa varṇe ca evam bhadra prakṛtiḥ abhyastā tiryaggatānām api na nivartate iti
iti śatapatra jātakam catustriṃśattamam
kṛtiḥ iyam ārya śūrapādānām
